concepts.name: Counting Up/Down
concepts.description: Count forward or backward by 1s within 1,000.

concepts.name: Place Value to 1,000,000
concepts.description: Identify the value of each digit up to the millions place.
examples: What is the value of 7 in 275,412?

concepts.name: Identity & Inverse Properties
concepts.description: Additive identity 0, multiplicative identity 1, and inverses.
examples: What is the multiplicative inverse of 4⁄5?

concepts.name: Fractions as Part–Whole
examples: Write the fraction for 2 red marbles out of 5.

concepts.name: Fraction-Decimal Conversion
concepts.description: Convert terminating fractions to decimals and back.
examples: Express 0.75 as a fraction in simplest form.

concepts.name: Greatest Common Factor
concepts.description: Find GCF of two whole numbers ≤100.
examples: What is the GCF of 48 and 64?

concepts.name: Least Common Multiple
concepts.description: Find LCM of two whole numbers ≤50.

concepts.name: Integer Addition/Subtraction
concepts.description: Add and subtract positive and negative integers.

concepts.name: Absolute Value as Distance
concepts.description: Interpret |a| as distance from 0 on the number line.
examples: Which has greater absolute value: −5 or 4?

concepts.name: Order of Operations
concepts.description: Apply PEMDAS to simplify numeric expressions.

concepts.name: Translate Expressions
concepts.description: Convert word problems to algebraic expressions

concepts.name: Identify Like Terms
concepts.description: Spot terms with identical variable part.

concepts.name: Distributive Property
concepts.description: Expand a(b+c) and factor out common factor.

concepts.name: Evaluate Expression
concepts.description: Substitute values and calculate algebraic expressions

concepts.name: Multi-Step Linear Equations
concepts.description: Equations requiring distribution, combining terms, etc.

concepts.name: Proportional Relationships & k
concepts.description: y = kx relationships and constant of proportionality

concepts.name: Unit Rate & Slope Concept
concepts.description: Interpret slope as rate of change.
examples: You travel 180 km in 3 h. Unit rate?
From the graph find slope as rise/run.

concepts.name: Coordinate Plane Plotting
concepts.description: Plot ordered pairs in four quadrants.

concepts.name: Distance Formula
concepts.description: Find distance between two plane points.
examples: Is segment AB of length √40? A(1,2) B(5,8)

concepts.name: Slope from Two Points
examples: Find slope of a horizontal line.

concepts.name: Parallel & Perpendicular Slopes
examples: Line l: y=3x−2. Give slope of line parallel to l.
Equation of line through (2,1) perpendicular to y=−¼x+5.

concepts.name: Graph Linear Inequality (1-var)
concepts.description: Graph solutions to x > 3, x ≤ -2 on number line

concepts.name: System – Graphing
concepts.description: Solve a linear system by intersecting lines.
examples: Graph and solve y=2x+1 and y=−x+7.
Estimate intersection of y=0.5x−4 and y=3x+2.

concepts.name: System – Solution Classification
concepts.description: Decide one, none, or infinitely many solutions.

concepts.name: Multiply Monomial·Polynomial
concepts.description: Distribute a monomial across a polynomial.

concepts.name: Polynomial Division (Synthetic)
concepts.description: Divide by x−k and find remainder.
examples: Use synthetic division to find f(3) for f(x)=2x³+x²−5.

concepts.name: Vertex from Standard Form
examples: Given vertex (h,k) compute axis of symmetry.

concepts.name: Discriminant & Roots
concepts.description: Analyze b²−4ac for number/type of roots.
examples: How many real roots does x²−7x+12 have?

concepts.name: Graph Parabola (Vertex Form)
examples: Identify vertex and direction of y=2(x−1)²−4.

concepts.name: Function Transformations
concepts.description: Shifts, reflections, stretches of parent graphs.
examples: Describe transformation from y=x² to y=(x−4)²−7.
